com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning

Class AdditiveScoringStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.joliciel.talismane.machineLearning.AdditiveScoringStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScoringStrategy<ClassificationSolution>

    public class AdditiveScoringStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements ScoringStrategy<ClassificationSolution>
    For perceptrons and other additive score methods. Simply adds all of the scores for individual decisions, and divides by the number of decisions.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli
